snippet: Indianapolis General Manager Ryan Grigson, named the executive of the year in the N.F.L. last season, has been unable to duplicate his success.
abstract: Analysis; Indianapolis Colts General Manager Ryan Grigson, named the executive of the year in the NFL last season, has been unable to duplicate his success; next off-season, Grigson will be challenged to cover up the weak spots on his roster; and despite the executive of the year awards on his shelf, some of the damage was self-made.
lead_paragraph: Indianapolis General Manager Ryan Grigson, named the executive of the year in the N.F.L. last season, has been unable to duplicate his success.

headline.main: After Taking Big Step, Colts Stumble a Bit
headline.print_headline: After Taking Big Step, Colts Stumble a Bit
